title: ARIEL Hepburn 37" Inch Left Offset Rectangle Sink Vanity with 0.75 Inch Edge Carrara White Countertop in Midnight Blue
features: Hardwood plywood construction for lasting beauty and durability. Midnight blue painted finish. 22"D x 37"W x 36"H

2 soft-closing doors with adjustable hinges so you'll never have to worry about hearing a door slam. Four full extension, self-closing drawers and one 45-degree open drawer to meet all your storage needs. Dove-tail construction drawer boxes for additional strength and stability
Carrara White Marble countertop with 0.75 inch edge and matching backsplash. Matte Black finish hardware included
Plinth base creates a floating effect
description: The Hepburn Vanity Collection from ARIEL Bath is the perfect combination of elegance and form, taking inspiration from traditional cabinetry but with a modern twist. Constructed from high quality hardwood plywood, this vanity will be sure to last for many years to come. Cabinets are available in Grey, Midnight Blue, or White finishes, you can be sure to find the right color fit for your bathroom decor.
